mPickupItems.description: Items we should gain when picking up the item, @todo: Remove BlueprintReadOnly

mPickupEvent.description: Audio event to be posted when picked up, @todo: Remove BlueprintReadOnly

mPickupEffect.description: The effect to play where the pickup was, @todo: Remove BlueprintReadOnly

mVehicleDestroyedEvent.description: Audio event to be posted when run over by a vehicle, @todo: Remove BlueprintReadOnly

mVehicleDestroyedEffect.description: The effect to play when run over by a vehicle, @todo: Remove BlueprintReadOnly

mExplosionDestroyedEffect.description: The effect to play when destroyed by an explosive. If one is not specified it may fall back to either the vehicle effect or pickup effect

mFXPriority.description: Specifies priority for spawning against other effects. Must be implemented by the spawning class. ex: FGDestructiveProjectile

mFoliageIdentifiers.description: What does this foliage identify itself as
